title: If Titan Cement is allowed to build its kiln and 400 foot tall smokestack at the  Ideal Cement site in Castle Hayne, will the super-hot emissions from the smokestack create air turbulence or other problems for airplanes in the flight paths to or from Wilmington International Airport?
text:
That's doubtful, but there is an air quality assessment that should
be complete in the next month or so, and then a larger environmental
review, which isn't due for another year. One of those reviews will
give us more information at that time.
